entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle and a few flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 8:05 PM NST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4 with temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 4 with temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:05 PM NST Wednesday 08 February 2023
